channel.title: Plasma_mobile on Blogger Bust
channel.description: Recent content in Plasma_mobile on Blogger Bust

item.title: Install And Configure PostmarketOS With Plasma Mobile
item.description: Introduction In this post I will install PostmarketOS + Plasma Mobile. At the time of this writing many Plasma Mobile features are either not fully integrated or not working at all. I will be focusing on the configuring postmarketOS so that by the end of this post you should be able to make phone calls and both send and receive SMS. I will also delve into extra detail on subjects that I find interesting or that I think might be helpful for you to know when trouble shooting issues.
